page.title: 06WYCOMBE SPORTS CENTRE
page.content: WORK STARTED ON THE SPORTS CENTRE IN 1973.IT WAS ACTUALLY OPENED IN 3 PHASES,THE FINAL ONE BEING IN THE SUMMER OF 1977. THERE ARE 46 MEMBERS OF STAFF.38 WORK FULL TIME WHICH IS 38 HOURS A WEEK. THE{SPORTS HALL}IS USED FOR{SPECTATOR {SPORTS}SUCH AS BADMINTON,TABLE TENNIS, VOLLEYBALL,BASKETBALL,NETBALL,HOCKEY, CRICKET,JUDO,KARATE,TRAMPOLINE, 5-A-SIDE FOOTBALL,GYMNASTICS AND SPECIAL EVENTS. 45-50% OF PEOPLE WHO VISIT THE CENTRE ARE CHILDREN.PEOPLE WHO COME USUALLY STAY 1-2HRS.THERE ARE NOT MANY{FOREIGN {TOURISTS}BUT THE ONES WHO DO COME USUALLY COME FROM EUROPE.THE MAIN SPORTS THEY PLAY ARE TABLE TENNIS, BADMINTON,TENNIS AND SWIMMING. THE SPORTS CENTRE IS SOMETIMES USED BY {FAMOUS PERSONALITIES}AS WELL AS THE CHILDREN FROM OUR SCHOOL.
